newsitem.title: CHINA: China bank to extend $482 mln in mortgage loans.
newsitem.headline: China bank to extend $482 mln in mortgage loans.

text.p: The Industrial and Commercial Bank of China will extend mortgage loans totalling four billion yuan ($481.9 million) to Chinese house buyers this year, the Xinhua news agency said on Tuesday.
Xinhua did not give the terms of the loans.
The bank will extend mortgage loans to individuals as well as companies that guarantee loans taken out by employees and handle repayment, the news agency quoted a bank spokesman as saying.
The bank is one of China's four largest commercial banks.
